list.name: Default Changelist
list.comment:
Add tab event listeners and media handling enhancements.
Implemented event listeners for tab updates, activations, creations, and replacements to dynamically manage side panel behaviors and update media handling. Refactored message handling to better differentiate between events, adding targeted functions for improved extension responsiveness. Updated the workspace configuration to reflect these changes.

task.summary: Default task
new extension
download audio and video
change media type
audio and video name
add posters to videos
change tables to grid layout
manifest V3

Add IDE configuration files
Include code style configuration and JavaScript library mappings. This ensures consistent code formatting and proper library setup across all development environments.

Remove LESS rules from .editorconfig
Deleted specific LESS formatting rules from .editorconfig to streamline the configuration. This simplifies the file and reduces unnecessary complexity for LESS files.

Add @types/chrome library to project settings
Included the @types/chrome library in the project's .idea/Media-downloader.iml to enhance TypeScript support for Chrome extensions. Updated the .idea/workspace.xml file with various changes and corrections, including recent templates and file paths.

Add new SVG icons
Included audio, download, video, and image SVG files in the icons directory. These additions will enhance the project's graphical assets and support various media-related features.

Add JSDoc comments to DOM utility functions
Enhanced the documentation by adding JSDoc comments for the functions `setDisabled`, `hasClass`, `toggleClass`, `hide`, and `show`. This improves code readability and provides detailed usage information for these functions.

Add new download and UI features
Removed main.css and added new download functionality in download-functions.js. Refactored send_media.js for better filtering of media, added side panel CSS, updated manifest for side panel support, and improved utility functions with JSDoc comments.

Add new download and UI features
Removed main.css and added new download functionality in download-functions.js. Refactored send_media.js for better filtering of media, added side panel CSS, updated manifest for side panel support, and improved utility functions with JSDoc comments.

Add new download and UI features
Removed main.css and added new download functionality in download-functions.js. Refactored send_media.js for better filtering of media, added side panel CSS, updated manifest for side panel support, and improved utility functions with JSDoc comments.

Refactor download flow and add new APIs
Replaced chrome.downloads.download with downloadUrl function in download-functions.js for better modularity. Introduced chrome-api.js to encapsulate Chrome scripting and tab management APIs. Minor UI and functionality improvements in popup.js, including improved event handling.

Add changelog page and enhance media handling
Introduced a new changelog page with historical updates and styling. Improved the media extraction logic in send_media.js to handle <source> tags and added data-poster support. Updated permissions in manifest.json and ensured proper version handling in background.js.

Remove media handling files and update UI components
Deleted send_media.js and associated SVG assets to streamline media handling. Introduced options.html with theme selection feature and refactored various files for better organization and maintainability.

**Update dark theme colors and improve popup.js**
Changed dark theme colors in accordion.css to darker shades for better visibility. Enhanced popup.js to reflect the count of selected items and fixed the download button activation logic.

**Refactor media display logic and cleanup**
Extracted media display logic from popup.js to new media-display.js for better organization. Removed redundant getThumbnail function from utils.js and improved code readability. Added alt attribute handling in createElement function in dom-functions.js.

**Add video support and refactor media display**
Enhanced media handling by adding video support alongside images. Refactored functions for better modularity and code clarity. Updated styles and improved event handling for media elements.

**Simplify media display logic**
Refactored media-display.js to streamline element creation and improve readability. Introduced helper functions for creating DOM elements in dom-functions.js. Added CSS for themes and improved styling consistency across components.

**Remove debug logs from various files**
Eliminated console.log statements from multiple files to clean up the output. This enhances code readability and reduces unnecessary noise in the console for better debugging efficiency.

**Add default inspection profile for the project**
Introduced a new inspection profile file in .idea to set default code inspection rules. This ensures consistency in code quality checks and facilitates better development practices.

**Introduce accordion web components**
Added new accordion web components (`accordion`, `accordion-item`, `accordion-header`, `accordion-body`) and replaced old DOM manipulation code with these components for better modularity and readability. Refactored `grid-item` component handling and updated script imports in `downloader.html` accordingly.

**Add alt attribute and filename support**
Enhanced media elements to include `alt` attributes and updated download logic to utilize `filename`. Improved event handlers and streamlined related components for better maintainability.

**Add duration support for audio files**
Added duration attribute to grid items and updated audio-thumbnail component to display formatted duration. Improved icon component with dynamic font-size handling for better flexibility.

**Add duration support for audio files**
Added duration attribute to grid items and updated audio-thumbnail component to display formatted duration. Improved icon component with dynamic font-size handling for better flexibility.
fix batch download

Update workspace tasks and remove redundant changes
Clean up outdated file change records in workspace.xml for better clarity. Incremented local task counter and added task metadata to maintain correctness in task management.

Enhance grid item class handling and clean workspace tasks
Added dynamic class handling in grid-item component based on item selection. Simplified media display initialization and updated workspace.xml to remove redundant entries and reflect recent changes.

Enhance grid item class handling and clean workspace tasks
Added dynamic class handling in the grid-item component based on item selection. Simplified media display initialization and updated workspace.xml to remove redundant entries and reflect recent changes.

Remove all_urls permission and clean workspace tasks
Removed the unnecessary "<all_urls>" permission from manifest.json to enhance security. Updated workspace.xml by cleaning up redundant entries and adjusting task metadata for better clarity.

Remove trailing space in manifest.json
Fixed an issue with a trailing space in the host_permissions entry of manifest.json. This ensures the file adheres to proper formatting standards and avoids potential permission parsing errors.

Expand permissions in manifest.json
Added "<all_urls>" to the host_permissions array in manifest.json. This change allows the extension to access all URLs, thereby broadening its operability. Adjusted the file to match updated security requirements and enhance functionality.

Fix download errors in grid item component
Updated `filename` and `src` attributes to use `data` properties for the grid-item component. Adjusted `downloadItem` function to correctly reference URL and filename. Incremented version to 2.0.1 and updated the changelog accordingly.

Add default action toggle and refactor settings page.
Implemented ability to switch between opening a popup or side panel as the default action. Refactored the options page to include separate sections for theme and default action settings. Enhanced radio button styling and updated background script to handle new default action settings.

Prevent YouTube downloads and update Chrome version.
Added a warning message in the UI about the Chrome policy against YouTube downloads and updated the extension functionality to hide the download button on YouTube pages. Included new functions to show and hide elements. Also updated the minimum Chrome version to 116 in manifest.json.

Add default popup dimensions script.
Introduced a new script to set dimensions for popups based on the default action stored in Chrome's sync storage. This ensures consistent UI behavior when the extension opens in popup mode. Updated related workspace files to include references to the new script.

Add CSS styling for .yt-info class.
Added padding, font-size, and line-height properties for the .yt-info class to enhance its appearance and readability. These changes ensure consistent and improved UI for elements using this class.

Add conditional header display for accordion items.
Introduced `showHeader` property to conditionally render accordion item headers. Updated associated CSS and HTML to reflect this change, ensuring headers can be hidden when needed to improve UI flexibility and cleanliness.

Add tab event listeners and support conditional media handling.
Implemented event listeners for tab updates, activations, creations, and replacements to dynamically handle side panel behaviors and media updates. Refactored message handling to distinguish between different events and added relevant functions for each case, enhancing the extension's responsiveness to tab state changes.

Add chrome API TypeScript definitions.
Introduced TypeScript definitions for various Chrome APIs including accessibility features, actions, alarms, browser interaction, and bookmarks management. This will improve developer experience by providing proper type-checking, autocomplete, and better documentation when working with these APIs.

Add tab event listeners and media handling enhancements.
Implemented event listeners for tab updates, activations, creations, and replacements to dynamically manage side panel behaviors and update media handling. Refactored message handling to better differentiate between events, adding targeted functions for improved extension responsiveness. Updated the workspace configuration to reflect these changes.

MESSAGE.value:
**Add video support and refactor media display**
Enhanced media handling by adding video support alongside images. Refactored functions for better modularity and code clarity. Updated styles and improved event handling for media elements.

**Simplify media display logic**
Refactored media-display.js to streamline element creation and improve readability. Introduced helper functions for creating DOM elements in dom-functions.js. Added CSS for themes and improved styling consistency across components.

**Remove debug logs from various files**
Eliminated console.log statements from multiple files to clean up the output. This enhances code readability and reduces unnecessary noise in the console for better debugging efficiency.

**Add default inspection profile for the project**
Introduced a new inspection profile file in .idea to set default code inspection rules. This ensures consistency in code quality checks and facilitates better development practices.

**Refactor and streamline codebase structure**
Deleted unused `download.svg` icon and moved various JavaScript and HTML files from the `src` directory to a more organized `js` directory. Introduced custom web components for grid items and refactored scripts to improve modularity and maintainability.

**Introduce accordion web components**
Added new accordion web components (`accordion`, `accordion-item`, `accordion-header`, `accordion-body`) and replaced old DOM manipulation code with these components for better modularity and readability. Refactored `grid-item` component handling and updated script imports in `downloader.html` accordingly.

**Add alt attribute and filename support**
Enhanced media elements to include `alt` attributes and updated download logic to utilize `filename`. Improved event handlers and streamlined related components for better maintainability.

**Remove redundant workspace change records**
Cleaned up unnecessary change logs from workspace.xml to reflect only relevant file modifications. Added a whitespace at the end of media-display.js for consistency.

**Add duration support for audio files**
Added duration attribute to grid items and updated audio-thumbnail component to display formatted duration. Improved icon component with dynamic font-size handling for better flexibility.
fix batch download

Add CSS styling for .yt-info class.

Add conditional header display for accordion items.
Introduced `showHeader` property to conditionally render accordion item headers. Updated associated CSS and HTML to reflect this change, ensuring headers can be hidden when needed to improve UI flexibility and cleanliness.

Add tab event listeners and support conditional media handling.

Refactored message handling to distinguish between different events and added relevant functions for each case, enhancing the extension's responsiveness to tab state changes.
